turns.content: I can't log into my account. I've tried resetting my password but the email never arrives.

I'm sorry you're having trouble. Let me help you troubleshoot. First, please check your spam folder. If the email isn't there, I can resend it to a different email address. Also, make sure you're using the correct email address associated with your account.
I checked spam and it's not there. Can you send it to my backup email?
